verses.plain: And God said unto Jacob, Arise, go up to Beth-el, and dwell there: and make there an altar unto God, that appeared unto thee when thou fleddest from the face of Esau thy brother.

tokens.t: And God said unto Jacob, Arise, go up to Beth-el, and dwell there: and make there an altar unto God, that appeared unto thee when thou fleddest from the face of Esau thy brother.

verses.plain: Then Jacob said unto his household, and to all that were with him, Put away the strange gods that are among you, and be clean, and change your garments:

tokens.t: Then Jacob said unto his household, and to all that
with him, Put away the strange gods that
among you, and be clean, and change your garments:

verses.plain: And let us arise, and go up to Beth-el; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.

tokens.t: And let us arise, and go up to Beth-el; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.

verses.plain: And they gave unto Jacob all the strange gods which were in their hand, and all their earrings which were in their ears; and Jacob hid them under the oak which was by Shechem.

tokens.t: And they gave unto Jacob all the strange gods which
in their hand, and
earrings which
in their ears; and Jacob hid them under the oak which
by Shechem.

verses.plain: And they journeyed: and the terror of God was upon the cities that were round about them, and they did not pursue after the sons of Jacob.

tokens.t: And they journeyed: and the terror of God was upon the cities that
round about them, and they did not pursue after the sons of Jacob.

verses.plain: ¶ So Jacob came to Luz, which is in the land of Canaan, that is, Beth-el, he and all the people that were with him.

tokens.t: ¶ So Jacob came to Luz, which
in the land of Canaan, that
, Beth-el, he and all the people that
with him.

verses.plain: And he built there an altar, and called the place El-beth-el: because there God appeared unto him, when he fled from the face of his brother.

tokens.t: And he built there an altar, and called the place El-beth-el: because there God appeared unto him, when he fled from the face of his brother.

verses.plain: But Deborah Rebekah’s nurse died, and she was buried beneath Beth-el under an oak: and the name of it was called Allon-bachuth.

tokens.t: But Deborah Rebekah’s nurse died, and she was buried beneath Beth-el under an oak: and the name of it was called Allon-bachuth.

verses.plain: ¶ And God appeared unto Jacob again, when he came out of Padan-aram, and blessed him.

tokens.t: ¶ And God appeared unto Jacob again, when he came out of Padan-aram, and blessed him.

verses.plain: And God said unto him, Thy name is Jacob: thy name shall not be called any more Jacob, but Israel shall be thy name: and he called his name Israel.

tokens.t: And God said unto him, Thy name
Jacob: thy name shall not be called any more Jacob, but Israel shall be thy name: and he called his name Israel.

verses.plain: And God said unto him, I am God Almighty: be fruitful and multiply; a nation and a company of nations shall be of thee, and kings shall come out of thy loins;

tokens.t: And God said unto him, I
God Almighty: be fruitful and multiply; a nation and a company of nations shall be of thee, and kings shall come out of thy loins;

verses.plain: And the land which I gave Abraham and Isaac, to thee I will give it, and to thy seed after thee will I give the land.

tokens.t: And the land which I gave Abraham and Isaac, to thee I will give it, and to thy seed after thee will I give the land.

verses.plain: And God went up from him in the place where he talked with him.

tokens.t: And God went up from him in the place where he talked with him.

verses.plain: And Jacob set up a pillar in the place where he talked with him, even a pillar of stone: and he poured a drink offering thereon, and he poured oil thereon.

tokens.t: And Jacob set up a pillar in the place where he talked with him,
a pillar of stone: and he poured a drink offering thereon, and he poured oil thereon.

verses.plain: And Jacob called the name of the place where God spake with him, Beth-el.

tokens.t: And Jacob called the name of the place where God spake with him, Beth-el.

verses.plain: ¶ And they journeyed from Beth-el; and there was but a little way to come to Ephrath: and Rachel travailed, and she had hard labour.

tokens.t: ¶ And they journeyed from Beth-el; and there was but a little way to come to Ephrath: and Rachel travailed, and she had hard labour.

verses.plain: And it came to pass, when she was in hard labour, that the midwife said unto her, Fear not; thou shalt have this son also.

tokens.t: And it came to pass, when she was in hard labour, that the midwife said unto her, Fear not; thou shalt have this son also.

verses.plain: And it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, (for she died) that she called his name Ben-oni: but his father called him Benjamin.

tokens.t: And it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, (for she died) that she called his name Ben-oni: but his father called him Benjamin.

verses.plain: And Rachel died, and was buried in the way to Ephrath, which is Beth-lehem.

tokens.t: And Rachel died, and was buried in the way to Ephrath, which
Beth-lehem.

verses.plain: And Jacob set a pillar upon her grave: that is the pillar of Rachel’s grave unto this day.

tokens.t: And Jacob set a pillar upon her grave: that
the pillar of Rachel’s grave unto this day.

verses.plain: ¶ And Israel journeyed, and spread his tent beyond the tower of Edar.

tokens.t: ¶ And Israel journeyed, and spread his tent beyond the tower of Edar.

verses.plain: And it came to pass, when Israel dwelt in that land, that Reuben went and lay with Bilhah his father’s concubine: and Israel heard it. Now the sons of Jacob were twelve:

tokens.t: And it came to pass, when Israel dwelt in that land, that Reuben went and lay with Bilhah his father’s concubine: and Israel heard
. Now the sons of Jacob were twelve:

verses.plain: The sons of Leah; Reuben, Jacob’s firstborn, and Simeon, and Levi, and Judah, and Issachar, and Zebulun:

tokens.t: The sons of Leah; Reuben, Jacob’s firstborn, and Simeon, and Levi, and Judah, and Issachar, and Zebulun:

verses.plain: The sons of Rachel; Joseph, and Benjamin:

tokens.t: The sons of Rachel; Joseph, and Benjamin:

verses.plain: And the sons of Bilhah, Rachel’s handmaid; Dan, and Naphtali:

tokens.t: And the sons of Bilhah, Rachel’s handmaid; Dan, and Naphtali:

verses.plain: And the sons of Zilpah, Leah’s handmaid; Gad, and Asher: these are the sons of Jacob, which were born to him in Padan-aram.

tokens.t: And the sons of Zilpah, Leah’s handmaid; Gad, and Asher: these
the sons of Jacob, which were born to him in Padan-aram.

verses.plain: ¶ And Jacob came unto Isaac his father unto Mamre, unto the city of Arbah, which is Hebron, where Abraham and Isaac sojourned.

tokens.t: ¶ And Jacob came unto Isaac his father unto Mamre, unto the city of Arbah, which
Hebron, where Abraham and Isaac sojourned.

verses.plain: And the days of Isaac were an hundred and fourscore years.

tokens.t: And the days of Isaac were an hundred and fourscore years.

verses.plain: And Isaac gave up the ghost, and died, and was gathered unto his people, being old and full of days: and his sons Esau and Jacob buried him.

tokens.t: And Isaac gave up the ghost, and died, and was gathered unto his people,
old and full of days: and his sons Esau and Jacob buried him.

footnotes.text: El-beth-el: that is, The God of Beth-el
Allon-bachuth: that is, The oak of weeping
a little…: Heb. a little piece of ground
Ben-oni: that is, The son of my sorrow
Benjamin: that is, The son of the right hand
